description: We love our Banana & Walnut Loaf with a delicious Cream Cheese frosting, but you can leave it off if desired.
name: Banana & Walnut Loaf with Cream Cheese Frosting Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup walnuts, chopped fine or left course

recipeInstructions.text: Loaf instructions: Gather all ingredients together. Preheat oven to 170 degrees fan forced. Grease and line with over hang, a loaf tin.
In a medium bowl, cream butter and sugar until pale and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla, beat until well combined.
Sift in flour, cinnamon and bicarb soda. Mix well with a wooden spoon, add milk and mix until just combined.
Add in banana and walnuts and mix until just combined.
Spoon mixture into prepared tin, smooth the top.
Bake for 25 minutes or until a skewer comes out clean, as each oven is different. Remove from oven to cool in the tin for 5 minutes, then cool completely on a wire rack.
Icing instructions: Into a medium bowl, add cream cheese and butter, beat until light and fluffy. Gradually add in icing mixture until desired consistency is reached. You may need more or less.
Spread the frosting on the cake in a decorative pattern and can add more Walnuts on top if desired.
Best stored in an airtight container in the fridge. Remove 5 minutes before serving and enjoy!
